Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server.Cards

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server.Cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server.Cards.PlayableCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, InitialCard, ResourceCard
public abstract class PlayableCard extends Card
Represents a standard playable card in the game's card set. Playable cards can be played by players and have associated resources and point values. This class is extended by specific types of playable cards.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(int id, int pointsGranted, Map<Resource,Integer> centerBackResources, Map<Side,Map<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>,Resource>> corners)
      Constructs a playable card with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the card.
      pointsGranted - The base points granted by this card.
      centerBackResources - The resources located at the center back of the card.
      corners - The resources located at the corners of the card, categorized by sides.

  • Method Details

    • getCornerResource

      public Resource getCornerResource(Side side, int x, int y)
      Returns the resource located at the specified corner of the card.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the card (front or back).
      x - The x-coordinate of the corner.
      y - The y-coordinate of the corner.
      Returns:
      The resource located at the specified corner.

    • getCorners

      public Map<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>,Resource> getCorners(Side side)
      Returns the map of resources located at the specified side of the card.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the card (front or back).
      Returns:
      The map of resources located on the corners of the specified side.

    • getCenterBackResources

      public Map<Resource,Integer> getCenterBackResources()
      Returns the map of resources located on center back of the card.
      Returns:
      The map of resources located on the center back.

    • awardPoints

      public int awardPoints(InGamePlayer target)
      Calculates and returns the number of points awarded to the specified player when this card is played. If the card is placed on the back side, no points are awarded.
      Specified by:
      awardPoints in class Card
      Parameters:
      target - The player who played the card.
      Returns:
      The number of points awarded by playing this card.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the playable card, including its unique ID, points granted, corners resources, and center back resources.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Card
      Returns:
      A string representation of the playable card.
